channel.title: Pages on Sorashi
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Sorashi

item.title: About
item.description: blockquote#pain { font-size: 30px; border-left: 10px solid #ccc; margin: .5em 10px; padding: 0 10px; quotes: "\201C""\201D""\2018""\2019"; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.4; font-family: "MS PGothic", "ＭＳ 明朝"; } blockquote#pain:before { content: open-quote; display: inline; height: 0; line-height: 0; left: -10px; position: relative; top: 30px; color: #ccc; font-size: 3em; } #painp{ margin: 0; } #painfooter{ margin:0; text-align: right; font-size: 1em; } #pain.translation { font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 24px; line-height: 1.3; } 俺たちは正義せいぎという名の復讐ふくしゅうへと駆かり立たてられた普通ふつうの人間だ｡ だが復讐を正義というならばその正義は更さらなる復讐を生うみ憎にくしみの連鎖れんさが始はじまる｡ ペイン We are but men, drawn to act in the name of revenge that we deem to be justice.
